column4: Is there a channel to just ask about what ppl recommend I do if im new to ubuntu and just kinda wanna get my grip on it?
If this wasn't my only computer, and its a dualboot, i would have broke it already :d
I suggest you start by getting used to the command line interface (CLI). google "linux basics termminal" or such and just play around. :)
Well... When I'm bored I just sit down with bash, type a letter and double-tab, find an app that looks remotely interesting and read the man-page. :P
